properties.name: Drive Fit
properties.short_description: Drive Fit creates cognitive training tools for driving.
properties.description:
Drive Fit creates cognitive training tools for driving. The company’s flagship product, Drive Focus, is a cognitive training app for both experienced and aspiring drivers.

Drive Fit was co-founded by Jay Monahan, Anthony Pagani, and Miriam Monahan in 2013 and is based in Williston, Vermont.

properties.bio: Internationally recognized clinician and researcher recognized for innovations in the field of cognition and driving and the visionary behind Drive Fit. Miriam is an Occupational Therapist, a Certified Driving Rehabilitation Specialist, and a Driving School Instructor. She has been practicing in the field of Driver Rehabilitation Program since 1998 in a variety of settings including academic, hospital, and private practice. She founded the nonprofit Driver Rehabilitation Institute to further research, education and innovation in the field of driver rehabilitation.  She lectures extensively on the topic of driver rehabilitation, both nationally and internationally to medical professionals, law enforcement, and academics.  She has authored several textbook chapters on driver rehabilitation subjects and has been a co/author of 18 peer-reviewed publications. She has worked with Western University in London, Ontario to develop a Master in Clinical Science in Driver Rehabilitation.

Anthony is a talented designer and photographer that has made a career in creative arts for 23 years. Anthony has played a key role in the design and development of brand identities for a wide variety of new and mature companies and has been a critical part of multiple product development teams. Prior to Drive Fit, Anthony played a key role at Annie’s Naturals Inc in developing new product lines and transitioning the brand identity after the company’s acquisition by Annie’s Inc in 2006, and more recently General Mills.

A medical physicist by training, Jay began his career as a research physicist at Harvard Medical School and then worked in the medical device industry. For the past twenty years Jay has provide market and business analysis, business strategy, and new business development consulting services for cutting-edge technology companies. Integral to this work, he has built and led multiple high performing teams at companies ranging in size from startups to multi-billion dollar multinationals. Prior to Drive Fit, Jay was part of a five person team that created the most profitable global business unit by far at Amsterdam-based Draka ($2B), followed by acquisition by Milan-based Prysmian Group ($8B).

Anthony is a talented designer and photographer that has made a career in creative arts for 23 years. Anthony has played a key role in the design and development of brand identities for a wide variety of new and mature companies and has been a critical part of multiple product development teams. Prior to Drive Fit, Anthony played a key role at Annie’s Naturals Inc in developing new product lines and transitioning the brand identity after the company’s acquisition by Annie’s Inc in 2006, and more recently General Mills.

With a background in engineering and software development and experience in project management, resource planning and all aspects of IT, Erik brings a successful track record founding, growing, capitalizing and selling internet businesses. Erik’s first company was acquired by AOL. Erik’s previous company My Web Grocer, is the leading provider of digital grocery services in the U.S.

With a JD in Corporate and Commercial Law and from an MBA in Marketing from the Wharton school, Susan brings a wealth of experience in property & casualty insurance company marketing, branding and market identity, communication, innovation and public policy. Experienced in start-ups, Susan is an expert in strategic, actionable marketing plans.
